Text: thanks. is this series really as good as I've heard?

it depends on your tastes (pun intended). i think i'm lucky because i only started reading it last year, and i started from #1. 

it has changed over the run from more of a straight-up police procedural story with sci-fi elements to more comedy and running jokes and layman (writer) really lets guillory (artist) go crazy and fill it with sight gags. which is either great or distracting, depending on your tastes...

i recommend it definitely, it's on my top 10 right now for sure. but i think i'd try reading the first trade paperback before anything else.
